trans-unit.source: The source of the event, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源，即 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting" />, and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting" /> events of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示將處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating" /> 控制項之 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting" />、<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Inserting> event to perform any preprocessing steps, such as adding a parameter to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> to capture the value of an output parameter, before a database action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Inserting>事件以執行任何前置處理步驟，例如新增參數至<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>物件所包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>之前擷取輸出參數的值，資料庫動作會執行。

trans-unit.source: In this example an insert is performed by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in a classic master-detail scenario, using a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中所執行的 insert<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項在傳統主版詳細資料案例中，使用預存程序。

trans-unit.source: The value of the output parameter, which represents the primary key of the newly inserted row, is examined when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event is raised after the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數值，代表新插入的資料列的主索引鍵，會進行檢查時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>在作業完成之後，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> event raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, to possibly cancel a database action performed by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，可能會取消所執行的資料庫動作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>與相關聯控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。
